block.p: The following equity offerings are expected this week: Affiliated Publications Inc., 2.24 million common shares. First Boston Corp.
Applied Immune Sciences Inc., 2.6 million common shares. Montgomery Securities.
Chipcom Corp., 1.55 million common shares. Montgomery Securities.
Duracell International, a global offering of 25 million common shares, with 19.75 million to be sold in the United States. Merrill Lynch & Co.
Elbit Computers, a global offering of two million common shares, with 1.5 million to be sold in the United States. Lehman Brothers.
Envoy Corp., two million common shares. Alex. Brown & Sons Inc.
FHP International Corp., 4.5 million common shares. Kidder, Peabody & Co.
Fabri-Centers of America Inc., 1.1 million common shares. Montgomery Securities.
Filene's Basement Corp., a global offering of 4.5 million common shares, with 3.6 million to be sold in the United States. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Fleming Cos., a global offering of four million common shares, with 3.2 million to be sold in the United States. Merrill Lynch & Co.
Goal Systems International, 2.5 million common shares. Morgan Stanley & Co.
Gottschalks Inc., 2.05 million common shares. Smith Barney, Harris Upham & Co.
Healthsouth Rehabilitation Corp., two million common shares. Smith Barney, Harris Upham & Co.
Hanger Orthopedic Group, three million common shares. Paine Webber Inc.
Homedco Group, 3.7 million common shares. Robertson, Stephens & Co.
IMC Fertilizer Group, a global offering of five million common shares, with four million to be sold in the United States. Lehman Brothers.
Immune Response Corp., 2.2 million common shares. Montgomery Securities.
Micropolis Corp., two million common shares. Kidder, Peabody & Co. NCNB Corp., a global offering of 10 million common shares, with 8.5 million to be sold in the United States. Merrill Lynch & Co.
National Health Laboratories, a global offering of 40 million common shares, with 28 million to be sold in the United States. First Boston Corp.
Photoronics Inc., 1.4 million common shares. Prudential Securities.
Pinkerton's Inc., 1.75 million common shares. Wertheim Schroder & Co.
Quantum Health Resources, 2.25 million common shares. Alex. Brown & Sons Inc.
Repligen Corp., two million common shares. Lehman Brothers.
Rite Aid Corp., a global offering of 4.75 million common shares, with 3.8 million to be sold in the United States. Merrill Lynch & Co.
T Cell Sciences Inc., two million common shares. Allen & Co.
Toll Brothers Inc., 4.5 million common shares. Salomon Brothers Inc.
Tucker Group, 1.25 million common shares. First Albany Corp.
U.S. Bioscience Inc., two million common shares. Alex. Brown & Sons Inc. Value Merchants Inc., 1.375 million common shares. William Blair & Co.
Westinghouse Electric Corp., a global offering of 19 million common shares, with 15 million to be sold in the United States. Lehman Brothers.
Source: MCM CorporateWatch
